jd: From: Sameer, GSK Solutions Inc sameer@gsksolutions.com Reply to: sameer@gsksolutions.com Job Title: IT Project Manager (Hybrid)Location: Richmond, VADuration:6+ MonthsJob Type: Corp-Corp / 1099 / Contract W2Rate: $80/hr on C2CClient: State of VirginiaInterview Type: Webcam Job Description: The individual in this position works in the DMAS Project Management Office as a Project Manager. The position will be responsible for project management services for a variety of DMAS initiatives that will include both technology and business projects. Experience in the field of Medicaid Management IT Systems and a general understanding of the business is preferred. DutiesManage full project lifecycle, including, procurement (where needed), planning, execution, controlling, and closeout of for Information Technology (IT) and Business projects.Apply Agile, Waterfall and Hybrid methodologies as needed.Perform vendor management functions as needed. Track and manage vendor deliverables.Manage project schedules, budgets, risks, issues status updates etc. during the project life cycle.Produce detailed project plans and build schedules utilizing MS project. Create both standalone and integrated project schedules.Capability to manage multiple projects and priorities.Manage stakeholder communications and expectations. Communicate with senior leadership as needed.Produce project dashboards and presentations. Lead meetings and present information to a variety of stakeholders.Create workflows, user stories and project requirements as needed. Required/Desired Skills SkillRequired /DesiredAmountof ExperienceExperience managing large projects, stakeholders, and leading project teamsRequired10YearsAdvanced knowledge and experience in using MS projectRequired6YearsAdvanced knowledge of using PowerPoint and Excel to analyze data and produce dashboardsRequired6YearsExperience in leading Waterfall projectsRequired10YearsExperience in leading Waterfall and Agile projectsRequired6YearsAdvanced knowledge of MS VisioRequired5YearsActive PMP certificationRequired0 Experience of working in the Medicaid or Managed Care OrganizationsDesired0
